title: How to Make Homemade Cheese
steps: Pour the milk into a large pot and heat until it reaches 90F (32.2C).
Add the yogurt and keep the heat at a constant temperature for 15 minutes while stirring.
Put the rennet tablet in the pot and continue to mix for about 4 to 5 more minutes.
Cover the pot and continue to keep the temperature constant.
Chop the curds that have formed into 1/2 in.
Raise the temperature gently to 118F (47.7C) over the next 45 minutes, then let the temperature remain at 118F (47.7C) for a constant 15 minutes.
Reserve the whey, and put the curd into a flat, warm pan and turn it over every 15 minutes for a total period of 2 hours.
Cut the curd into strips that are 1 to 2 in.
Take the curd out of the hot water and form it into a ball, then place it in water at a temperature of 40F (4.4C) for about 1 hour.
Make a salt brine and place the cheese into it.

title: How to Make Butter Without a Butter Churner

Pour your butter and your mixture into the filter so all the liquid drains to the bottom of the container and your butter is left on the top.
The liquid on the bottom is great for coffee cream and the butter left over tastes great.
If you want, you can add salt to the butter so the butter can have more flavor.

title: How to Can Cabbage
steps: Prepare the cabbage for canning.

Clean 7 glass quart (946mL) canning jars and metal lids with soap and hot water.
Pack the clean jars with the cabbage.
Wipe the rims of the jars with a clean cloth, stir gently to allow air bubbles to escape and cover with the metal lids.
Place the cover securely on the canner and heat water to boiling.
Process jars in the pressure canner for 20 minutes, adjusting the pressure based on your altitude (see guide below).
Turn off heat and allow pressure to return to 0 PSI (0 kPa), then remove the weights or open the vent and wait for 2 minutes.
Remove the jars from the canner with a jar lifter and place them on a wooden board or thick kitchen towel to allow them to cool in a draft free area.
Label the jars with ingredients and the date, then store in a cool, dark and dry location.

title: How to Descale a Map Coffee Machine

You could add a layer of marshmallows (one continuous layer of mini-marshmallows or one somewhat spaced layer of large ones) when adding the spices.

For better appearance, uncover the spiced and sugared sweet potatoes after they've cooked a half-hour or so, cover them with marshmallows, check that nothing else is in the oven, and broil them for a minute or so to lightly brown the surface without the heat penetrating much through the airy marshmallows.

Allow to cool to being merely warm (check the sweet potatoes or the bottom of the pan, not the marshmallow topping, which due to being insulated will be cool on the outside when the inside is still hot) and serve.

When it begins to simmer, cover the pan with a lid and cook gently for approximately 15 minutes, or until the rice is fully cooked.
Mix the flaked haddock, chopped boiled eggs, parsley and lemon juice in with the cooked rice.
Serve with plenty of vegetables.
Finished.

title: How to Make a Root Beer Frost
steps: Pour the can of root beer into a freezable container.
Place the container in the freezer for 30-40 minutes, or until the root beer turns into soft ice.
Remove the container from the freezer.
Place the pieces of frozen root beer into the blender.
Blend on medium to high until the root beer ice becomes a smooth, frosty root beer drink.
Pour the root beer frost into a cup, glass, or mug.

title: How to Thicken a Low Carb Sauce
steps: Enjoy a low carbohydrate hot fudge sauce.
Make a low carbohydrate cashew vanilla sauce.
Revel in a low carbohydrate blueberry sauce.

title: How to Dry Gourds
method: Cleaning Gourds after They are Dried
steps: Clean the gourd after it has dried completely.
Use the dull side of a table knife to scrape the outer skin off.
Fill any small holes or cracks with wood putty.

title: How to Cook Yuca Root
steps: Cut yuca into 3 inches (7.6 cm) sections.
Fill a 1.5 gallons (5.7 L) pot with cold water.
Lower heat to medium and cover.
Mix the yuca, butter, and cream.
Add nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

title: How to Drink Peach Brandy
steps: Use a highball drinking glass for a classic fuzzy navel.
Combine peach schnapps, peach brandy, and triple sec in your glass.
Stir in orange juice and ice to finish your drink.

title: How to Make Homemade Pocky
steps: Combine the water and condensed milk together and set aside.
Pour in flour, sugar, salt and baking powder in an electric mixer.
Dump butter inside the electric mixer.
Pour in the condensed milk and water mixture.
Place dough on large sheet of plastic.
Preheat oven to 300 F (150C).
Place Pocky on oiled pan.
Bake the Pocky sticks for 18-20 minutes.
Melt your Pocky cream in the microwave.
Microwave your Pocky cream option for intervals of 30 seconds until completely melted.
Dip your pocky in the melted sauce.
Munch on your Pocky.

title: How to Make Slow Cooker Shredded Chicken
steps: Add to salads or casseroles.
Make wraps, tacos, sandwiches, and burritos.
Use a flavored shredded chicken as an entree.

title: How to Make Cinnamon Hot Chocolate
steps: Add the cocoa powder, sugar and salt to a heavy based saucepan.
Pour in the hot water.
Bring to the boil.
Turn down the heat.
Add the milk in small amounts.
Pour in the caramel sauce.
Remove from the heat.
Serve.

title: How to Make Chocolate Fudge
steps: Heat a medium saucepan over low heat.
Add the coconut butter, cocoa powder, vanilla, and sea salt.
Stir the honey into the coconut mixture.
Prepare a pan for the mixture.
Pour the fudge into the pan.
Cover the pan and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Serve.

title: How to Make Mars Bar Custard
steps: Cut the Mars Bar into small pieces.
Pour the custard into a small saucepan.
Gently heat the custard over low heat.
Pour the cut mars chocolate on the top of the custard.
Stir until all traces of the Mars Bar have melted into the custard.
Pour custard into bowls, or serve over pudding.
Finished.

title: How to Make Orange Citrus Steak Sauce
steps: Cook a steak or two in a cast iron skillet.
Put the steaks on a plate (you will eat them soon).
Leave the heat from the stove on with the empty skillet.
Allow it to sit for about three minutes.
Pour a little water on the hot pan.
Scrape the pan with a wooden spoon, creating a brownish gravy.
Add a little orange juice which should do the same thing.
Roll it around in the pan a little to mix it.
Pour the sauce into a saucer or bowl.

title: How to Skin a Chicken
method: Taking the Skin Off Cooked Chicken
steps: Allow the chicken to cool.
Use a knife to free an edge of the skin.
Peel the skin off.

title: How to Broil
steps: Brush the fruits and/or vegetables with butter.
Place the vegetables and/or fruits on a baking dish or pan.
Put the pan in the oven on the lower rack and broil the items.
Remove the items when their exteriors have browned.

title: How to Sauté Spinach
steps: Heat the olive oil or butter in a large sauté pan or heavy skillet.
Add the mushrooms.
Turn down the heat to medium.
Add the spinach in thirds.
Remove from the heat.
Finished.

title: How to Make a Tiered Cake That Doesn't Tilt
steps: Start with the different sized cakes.
Dowel rods are essential for giving the cakes strength so you can stack them on top of one another.
Measure the cakes from bottom to top, then cut the dowels to the correct size.
Insert the dowels into each separate cake, placing them about halfway between the center of the cake and the edge.
Once all of the cakes are doweled, start with the largest cake.
Finished.

title: How to Make Fruit Punch
steps: Bring the sugar and 1 cup water to a boil.
Mix the syrup and juices.
Add the strawberry syrup.
Add the rum.
Mix in the water.
Serve the punch plain or over ice.

title: How to Make Sweet Potato and Yam Chips
steps: Peel sweet potatoes.
Slice thinly.
Place in bowl and coat with oil and salt.
Arrange slices on a baking sheet covered with parchment or sprayed with cooking spray.
Bake at 375 °F (191 °C) for 20 minutes on one side.
Flip chips.
Remove from heat and allow to cool before serving.
Finished.

title: How to Reheat Chicken
method: Reheating a Whole Store-Bought Rotisserie Chicken in an Oven
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).
Put the chicken on a prepared roasting dish and cover it.
Heat the chicken to 165 °F (74 °C).
Serve the chicken after letting it rest for 5 minutes.

title: How to Remove Rust from a Cast Iron Skillet
steps: Preheat your oven to 350 F (177 C).
Coat the dry pan with cooking oil.
Alternatively, use another source of fat.
Put the skillet into the oven for an hour.
Turn off the oven.

title: How to Make a Scottish Whisky Dundee Cake
steps: Weigh the fruit and peel and place into a bowl, sprinkling it with the 3 tablespoons (44.4 ml) whiskey.
Mix well, cover and leave overnight.
Preheat the oven to gas mark 3, 325°F or 170°C.
Put the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl and beat with a wooden spoon until light and fluffy.
Whisk the eggs separately then, a little at a time, beat them into the creamed butter and sugar.
Fold in the sifted flour and baking powder carefully, using a large tablespoon.
Add a dessertspoon of milk if the mixture seems too dry.
Fold in the ground almonds, currants, sultanas, cherries, mixed peel and orange and lemon rinds carefully.
Grease the cake tin and line it with greaseproof paper.
Spoon the mixture into the prepared cake tin, smoothing it out evenly with the back of the spoon.
Arrange the whole blanched almonds in circles on the top of the mixture, if you don't intend to ice the cake.
Place the cake in the centre of the oven and bake for 2-21/2 hours or until the centre is firm and springy to touch.
Let the cake cool in the tin for 30 minutes before taking it out to finish cooling on a wire rack.
Feed it, wrap it in double greaseproof paper and store it in foil or an airtight container 'till needed.
Finished.

title: How to Cut Ribeye
steps: Purchase a whole ribeye from the market.
Cut off the big pieces of fat on the back of the ribeye.
Turn the ribeye over and slice between the bones.
Trim off any fat that from the tail.

title: How to Make a Cheese Mouse
steps: Use a Camembert, Brie, or similar style of cheese of round shape with a thick rind.
Cut even triangles from the cheese round.
Add ears.
Add a nose.
Add the eyes.
Place on the cheeseboard or a serving platter.

title: How to Make Candied Orange Peel
steps: Wash and cut the oranges.
Peel and cut the peels into strips.
Boil and drain the strips.
Boil and drain the strips two more times.
Create a simple syrup.
Add the strips and simmer them for 30 minutes.
Dry the strips for 4 to 5 hours.
Use or store the candied orange strips.

title: How to Forage for Food in the Fall
steps: Decide which foods you'll try to store.
Dry the food.
Freeze the food.
Make jams and preserves.
Make pickles, chutneys and sauces.
Bake.
Enjoy the good life of your harvest throughout the winter.

title: How to Fix Salty Soup
steps: Salt your soup after boiling it instead of before.
Add a little bit of salt after incorporating each ingredient.
Avoid adding salt if the soup contains ingredients high in sodium.
Use fresh herbs rather than salt to season your soup.
Replace salted butter with unsalted butter in your recipe.
Use low-sodium broth to keep the soup from being too salty.
Let people salt their own soup to suit their tastes.

title: How to Store Turnips
steps: Wash and peel each turnip after removing the greens.
Cut the turnips into small cubes as you boil a pot of water.
Blanch the cubes for 2 minutes, then let them cool before draining the water.
Freeze the turnips in resealable containers for up to 1 year.

title: How to Make Dairy Free Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C).
Whisk the medium bowl ingredients in a bowl.
Blend the ingredients well using a blender or whisk.
Stir the extra ingredients into the batter.
Let the mixture stand for a few minutes and mix in the flour.
Drop tablespoonfuls of batter onto the cookie sheets.
Bake for about 7 – 10 minutes; be careful not to over bake.
Finished.

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon (14.2 g) of butter in a medium saucepan.
Add the onions to the pan and saute them for 10 minutes.
Stir in 1.5 tablespoons (15.6 g) of flour and 1 cup (240 ml) of beef stock.
Simmer the gravy for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove the gravy from the stove and serve it with the puddings.

steps: Take a pot, put in the raw rice and add enough tap water to cover the rice.
After the last drain, add in the lukewarm water, vinegar and sugar.
Turn on the high flame and wait for it to boil.
When it is boiling, turn the flame to the lowest so it can properly.
After it turns sticky, turn off the heat and take out the rice and mix with coconut shreddings.
Separate it into balls and flatten them a bit.
Add in different flavors for the different cakes.
Serve with chopsticks, a fork or a spoon.

title: How to Make a Lemon Drop
steps: Prepare the lemon slice, wedge, twist, or spiral.
If using a large glass such as a rocks glass or cocktail glass, rim the glass with sugar if desired.
Add ice to a cocktail shaker.
Add the ingredients to the shaker.
Cap the shaker.
Shake the ingredients vigorously for about five seconds.
Strain into a shot glass, cocktail glass or rocks glass without ice.
If desired, float the 151 rum on the surface of the drink and ignite with a lighter (see How to make layered shots about how to layer or float ingredients).
Place the lemon slice, wedge, spiral, or twist on or in the glass.
Serve the drink.

title: How to Print Your Own Wedding Invitations
steps: Print the invitations using your home printer.
Pay a printing company to print the invitations for you.

title: How to Make Chocolate Peanut Butter Truffles
steps: Add peanut butter chips and butter to saucepan.
Heat over low heat to melt the ingredients.
Add cocoa and stir.
Add sweetened condensed milk and vanilla and stir.
Cook mixture until thickened and blended, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and place on counter to cool.
Put cooled mixture into the refrigerator.
Let chill 2 hours.
Shape into walnut size pieces and roll into balls.
Roll in powdered sugar.
Chill.
Store in the refrigerator.

title: How to Make Arroz Con Gandules (Spanish Rice, Puerto Rican Style)
steps: Start off by boiling 4 cups of water into your nonstick cast aluminum pot, (Caldero, Non stick not advised) with teaspoon of salt.
Add a can of Goya Gandules.
Then add a tablespoon of homemade sofrito (store brand applicable).
Add one packet of SAZON GOYA "unique seasoning"  (seasoning).
Lower the pot to a medium heat and then add 3 cups of rice into pot.
Very important!.
Add tablespoon of cooking oil (keeps rice from becoming grainy or sticky) (skip step if you prefer a sticky rice).
Leave uncovered until rice absorbs all water (stay close by).
Stir the rice once the water has been absorbed.
Place lid on the rice and let cook for 15 to 20 minutes, (do not stir, allow to cook).
Finally the rice should be fluffy and ready to serve.
Lastly, Eat, Eat, and Enjoy!!!.

title: How to Make Fried Pork
steps: Put the pork slices in a mixing bowl and toss with the rice wine and 1 tablespoon of soy sauce.
Combine 1/4 cup of the chicken broth, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, the cornstarch, sesame oil, oyster sauce, and crushed red pepper in a small bowl.
Heat a wok or skillet over high heat.
Place the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for about 30 seconds, until softened.
Pour the soy sauce and chicken broth mixture into the pan and cook for an additional one minute, or until the sauce has thickened.
Return the pork to the pan and sprinkle in the cashews.

title: How to Make Lebkuchen
steps: Mix the confectioner’s sugar, lemon juice and cream in a bowl with a whisk until all of the sugar lumps have dissolved.
Spread a thin layer of icing on top of each cookie using a butter knife or cheese spreader.
Top the cookies with half of a candied cherry, placing the flat side of the cherry half onto the icing.
Allow the cookies and the icing to cool completely before you remove the cookies from the racks.

steps: Add Canadian whiskey, sour apple schnapps, and cranberry juice to a highball glass.
Put some ice in the glass.
Garnish the drink.

steps: Wash the pan with hot water and a sponge.
Scrub kosher salt into the pan.
Rinse the pot or pan.
Dry the pan thoroughly.

title: How to Make a Margarita
method: Salting the Rim of Your Glass
steps: Pour salt into a small saucer.
Wet the rim of your glass.
Salt the rim of your glass.

title: How to Cook Walleye
steps: Set your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
Create your stuffing.
Cut your Walleye in half and then stuff it.
Bake your Walleye for about 30 minutes at 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
Finished.

title: How to Make Game Day Sandwiches
method: Frying Up Nacho Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
steps: Heat a skillet on the stove.
Combine the sour cream and taco seasoning.
Butter the outside of two bread slices and place them in the pan.
Spread the sour cream over the bread slices in the pan.
Place the tomato, avocado, black beans, black olives, and tortilla chips over the sour cream.
Top the fillings with two slices of cheese and the remaining bread slices.. Once the fillings are on the sandwiches, cover them with two slices of pepper jack cheese on each sandwich.
Cook the sandwiches until the bottom is golden.
Flip the sandwiches and cook on the other side until it is golden.
Finished.

steps: Prepare your corn by making a marinade.
Preheat the grill.
Uncover the corn.
Transfer the corn to grill-safe cookware.
Alternatively, you can also transfer the corn into aluminum foil packets.
Bring the sides together and fold to seal.
Poke the foil with the tines of a fork.
Place the cookware or foil packets on the grill rack.
Allow the corn to cook for 3 minutes.
Cook the corn for an additional 3 minutes.
Serve hot.

title: How to Can Asparagus
steps: Obtain asparagus at their freshest point.
Wash the asparagus.
Cut the asparagus into spears.
Place the asparagus into medium-sized jars (preferably Mason).
Add salt.
Add boiling water.
Close the jars.
Put the jars into a pressure cooker.
Cool the jars.

Prepare the pumpkin.
Chop the removed pumpkin flesh into chunks.
Place the pumpkin into the preheated oven, lid on top.
Make the filling while the pumpkin bakes.
Add the slices of zucchini and mushroom pieces.
Add the tomatoes, pasta shells and pour in the stock.
Bring to the boil.
Remove from the heat.
Remove the baked pumpkin from the oven and place onto its serving plate.
Serve.

steps: Pour a half pint of Guinness into a pint glass.
Pour a half ounce of Bailey's Irish Cream into a 1 oz shot glass.
Pour a half ounce of Jameson's Irish Whiskey on top of the Bailey's.
Pinch the shot glass between your forefinger and thumb.
Place the rim of the shot glass just barely above the Guinness.
Release the shot and drink until empty.

title: How to Choose a Grill
steps: Choose a grill with shelves.
Get a built-in thermostat to avoid undercooking and overcooking.
Prioritize power if you’re grilling a lot at once.
Purchase a grill cover to preserve your grill.
Make sure your gas grill has at least two stainless steel or brass burners.
Buy a grilling basket or sheet to keep smaller foods from falling.
Stay away from unnecessary and complicated features if you’re a novice.

title: How to Make Vegan Artichoke & Spinach Dip
steps: Coat the baking dish with cooking spray as you preheat your oven to 350 F (180 C).
Combine the spinach, 1/2 cup of soy Parmesan, artichokes, pepper, lemon juice and mozzarella into a food processor and process until fully blended.
Pour the mixture into your prepared baking dish.
Sprinkle the leftover 1/4 cup of Parmesan onto the top of the dip.
Cover the casserole dish with aluminum foil.
Bake the dip for 20 minutes, and then remove it from the oven to cool.
Allow the dip to cool for 5 minutes on a cooling rack before serving it hot.
Finished.

steps: Soak the cranberries for 20 - 30 minutes in a bowl of boiling water.
Drain the cranberries and set aside.
Put the couscous and salt into an ovenproof dish.
Drizzle over the couscous with the tablespoon of ordinary olive oil.
Add hot stock or water.
Remove the foil and fluff the couscous with a fork.
Add the soaked cranberries to the steamed couscous.
Allow to steam in the oven for about 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and take off the cover.
Season to taste and drizzle over the extra virgin olive oil.
Finished.

Add the chocolate sauce.
Add the Cool Whip.
Add the melted caramel.
Enjoy your dip!.

Insert a spoon between the skin and flesh of the kiwifruit.
Rotate the spoon around the kiwifruit, beneath the skin.
Pop the fruit from the skin.
Slice the kiwifruit vertically in half.

title: How to Store Lemon Meringue Pie
steps: Add the meringue to the pie 10 minutes after you take it out of the oven.
Spread the meringue across the pie so that it’s touching the crust.
Watch the pie while it’s in the oven to avoid overbaking.

Cook over medium heat for ten minutes.
Add the barley, thyme and bay leaves.
Bring to the boil.
Remove the bay leaves.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Finished.

steps: Prepare salmon skins without the flesh in the oven.
Prepare salmon skins without the flesh on top of the stove.
Prepare salmon skins with the flesh in the broiler.

title: How to Make a Fondant Bunny
steps: Wash your hands before beginning.
Rub the white fondant together to get rid of any cracks.
Roll the white fondant into a fat sausage roll shape.
Form the body shape.
Form the front legs.
Form his back legs in the same manner and stick in place.
Create the bunny's head.
Make the bunny's ears.
Make the bunny's buck teeth.
Add a little nose made from the pink fondant.
Make the bunny's feet.
Add the bunny's eyes.
Attach the head.

title: How to Make Vegan Red Velvet Pancakes
steps: Whisk the soy milk and vinegar together in a small bowl.
Mix together the wheat flour, self-rising flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking soda and baking powder in another medium bowl.
Fold the soy milk and vinegar mixture into the flour mixture.
Heat the vegetable oil on a large skillet.
Add 1/3 cup of the batter onto the skillet.
Flip the pancake over when bubbles start to appear and let it cook on the opposite side.
Remove the pancake from the skillet after both sides of the pancakes are cooked and begin cooking the next pancake.
Whisk together the vegan sour cream, maple syrup and lemon juice when all pancakes have been cooked.
Serve the pancakes hot with the sour cream maple syrup "frosting" drizzled on top.

title: How to Grate Coconut
steps: Pour the coconut flakes onto an oven sheet or tray.
Put the coconut in a convection oven for two hours.
Dehydrate the flakes for six hours at 130°F (54.4°C) .

title: How to Make Light Hot Wings
steps: Mix hot sauce, ketchup, orange juice and brown sugar in a small bowl.
Make sure that all the lumps are mashed out from the brown sugar.
Dip the wings in the sauce until they are fully covered in sauce.
Repeat and enjoy.

steps: Lend flavor to soups and stews.
Enhance your favorite sauces.
Incorporate dried mushrooms into sizzling stir frys.
Add dried mushrooms to eggs.
Make some homemade herbed butter.

title: How to Cook a Rice, Meat and Vegetable Dish
steps: Buy two different types of vegetables at your local market.
Buy about 500 grams (1 pound) of cheap meat you like.
Buy rice, if you don't already have it.
Buy instant bouillon (tablets).
Heat some cooking oil in a big pan with a lid on high fire.
Cut the meat and the veggies into small pieces.
Add a cup of water and wait for the mixture to get to boiling.
Add the rice.
Let the mixture heat at low fire for 15 minutes.
Check after about 15 minutes to make sure the mixture is not getting to dry.
Heat for another 15 minutes (30 min.
Eat!.

method: Making a Bain Marie for Keeping Food Warm
steps: Fill a large sauce pan partway full of water.
Bring water to a simmer.
Place a metal ring at the base of this pan.
Place the smaller container inside the larger one.

title: How to Make Slow Cooker Fried Chicken
steps: Spray a slow cooker pot with nonstick cooking spray.
Add vegetable shortening or cooking oil to a large skillet.
Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika in a resealable food storage bag.
Add chicken pieces to seasoned flour and toss to coat.
Add coated chicken pieces to hot.
Drain browned chicken pieces on a paper towel lined plate or platter.
Add browned and drained chicken pieces to slow cooker pot.
Cover with lid.
Cook on high 1 hour then turn heat to low.
Cook chicken on low another 6 to 7 hours, or until tender.
Serves 4.

Using a serrated knife, carefully slice off the "dome" or top of the cake.
Cut off about an inch (2.5cm) of the side.
Prepare your cake shape.

title: How to Bake Healthy Cookies
steps: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (177 degrees Celsius).
Place 3 large, overripe mashed bananas in a large bowl.
Take another bowl and add 2/3 cup (63 g) of almond meal, 1/3 cup (24 g) of shredded coconut, 2 cups (312 g) of oats, 1/2 tsp.
Pour the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients and stir slowly.
Drop small balls of cookie dough onto the parchment paper.

title: How to Handle Uncooked Poultry
steps: Freeze poultry if you don't plan on cooking it within 3 days.
Defrost the poultry in the fridge for the best results.
Submerge the poultry in cold water to defrost it faster.
Cook the poultry from frozen if you're in a pinch.
Microwave the poultry if there's no other option.

title: How to Make Slow Cooker Enchilada Sauce

steps: Slice the chipotle peppers and remove the seeds.
Mix all of the ingredients in the slow cooker.
Cook the sauce for several hours.
Remove the chipotle peppers and puree the sauce.
Transfer the sauce to glass jars for storage.
Finished.

steps: Scoop one scoop of ice cream into two glass mason jars.
Pour one cup of both apple ciders into each of the glasses.
Squirt whipped cream onto the floats.
Stick a cinnamon stick and apple slice into the floats.

Chill the floats.

steps: Boil the pork belly in a small pot for 15 to 20 minutes, then set it aside.
Sauté the garlic in the oil until it becomes fragrant.
Toss in the onion and continue to cook it for 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir the tomatoes into the onions and cook them until they turn soft.
Add the shrimp paste and pork, then sauté it for 2 to 3 minutes.
Pour in ⁄4 cup (59 mL) of pork broth and simmer it for 40 minutes.
Season the dish with vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper.
Add the eggplant and coconut milk, then simmer it for 8 more minutes.
Serve the stew while it is still hot.

Place the spinach in your blender with about 2 US tbsp (30 mL) of water.
Blend the spinach for about 30 seconds or until the spinach is smooth.

title: How to Clean a Bunn Coffee Pot

Pour one quart (1 L) of vinegar into the brewer.

Unscrew the spray head.
Lift the entire coffee maker and empty all liquid contents.
Reattach the spray head.
Continue to pour water through the brewer.

title: How to Make a Cupcake in the Microwave

Microwave for about 1 1/2 minutes on HIGH.
Allow the cupcake in a cup to cool for 10 minutes.

title: How to Rechauffé food
steps: Plan ahead.
Start with the basics.

To réchauffé Vegetables - Should you have a range of fresh vegetables for steaming, sometimes it better to steam the whole vegetable (like cauliflower & pumpkin) rather than have raw leftovers that may rot or go stale.
Cooking like this means that you don't have surplus raw ingredients and you can reheat or serve a different way to save time.
With surplus boiled eggs, use them in sandwiches, curried eggs, scotch eggs or in salads.

With surplus roast, grilled, poached or steamed meat, it can be used in sandwiches, salads, curries, braises, Bolognese sauces, casseroles, soups etc, minced for rissoles, or sliced thinly, marinaded and used as another antipasto snack.
Rice can be easily reheated or used in fried rice, pasta can be used hot or cold in salads.
Surplus breads can be used for breadcrumbs in a food processor, bread and butter puddings, panades, sliced and baked or fried as croutons or garlic bread.
Cakes can be used in trifles, crumbled & mixed into ice-cream (similar to cookie ice-cream), covered with hot stewed fruits or heated with custard etc.
Fruits can be cut raw for fruit salads or stewed.
Stocks and sauces can be used as a foundation of other sauces, soups or stews.
Surplus raw cream may be used into butter, sauces, custards, ice-cream, baked desserts such as crème brulee or whipped and used in trifles.
Planning in advance on ways to use surplus food and reduce waste is the whole goal.

Place the strawberry on the cookie sheet and repeat step 7.
Pour the alcohol into the ¼ cup and stick the point of the clear pipette into the alcohol.
Squeeze the top of the pipette to fill the well with alcohol.
Stick the alcohol filled pipette carefully into the top of the strawberry.
Repeat the last step until all the pipettes are in the strawberries.
Place the strawberries in the fridge for 30 minutes and serve!.

title: How to Make Cream Vegetable Soup With Oregano and Flat Leaf Parsley
steps: Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium heat.
Add the flour and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, for 2 minutes more.
Pour in the stock and bring to a boil while whisking constantly.
Add the hard vegetables (onion, celery, potato, and carrots) and cook, covered, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 12 minutes.
Tie the parsley sprigs, thyme, and bay leaf with a piece of kitchen twine and add to the soup.
Add the tomato, cucumber, kale.
Whisk in the heavy cream, sherry, and salt into the soup and season with pepper to taste.
Lower the heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Strain the soup, returning the soup to the pot and blend with an immersion blender to make it creamier, if desired.
Remove and discard the herb bundle.
Divide among soup bowls, sprinkle the top of each soup with the chopped parsley and serve immediately.

title: How to Cook Bagel Bites
steps: Gather your ingredients.
Preheat the oven and slice the mini bagels in half.
Bake 16 sliced mini bagels on a parchment-lined baking sheet for 5 minutes.
Add sauce, cheese, and pepperoni to your mini bagels.
Return the mini bagels to the oven for 10-16 minutes.

title: How to Make Fig Newtons Pops
steps: Get small bowls or plates and separate each candy treat into each plate.
Poke a stick halfway through the middle of each Fig Newton.
Take a knife and spread a thin layer of peanut butter on each side of the Fig Newtons.
Coat the peanut butter with the treats by lightly dipping the figs into the dish that you want.
Carefully wrap each "candy Fig Newton" with plastic wrap, store in an airtight container, or serve right away.

title: How to Eat Truffles
steps: Wrap the truffle loosely in a towel.
Place the wrapped truffle inside a paper bag or a container with holes.
Keep the truffle in the fridge for no more than 3 days.
Freeze the truffle for up to 3 months if you want it to last longer.

title: How to Make a Watermelon Keg
steps: Wash the watermelon.
Mark the cut line.
Draw decorative features.
Cut off the top of the watermelon.
Gently remove the top.
Scoop out the watermelon flesh.
Save the goodies.
Clean out the inside of the watermelon using a wet paper towel.
Create the “watermelon keg”.
Fill the fruit keg with your favorite punch recipe.
Test first!.
Add watermelon.
Place the watermelon keg on display.

title: How to Make Rainbow Frosting
steps: Beat the butter and marshmallow creme in a large bowl using an electric mixer.
Pour in the powdered sugar.
Add in the salt and vanilla extract.
Separate the frosting into medium-sized bowls.
Add a teaspoon of food coloring into each frosting.
Spoon the frosting colors onto a piping bag.
Serve.

title: How to Make Orange Blossom Sugar
steps: If you haven't already dried the orange blossom flowers, do so first.
Place the dried orange blossom flowers and sugar into a mortar and grind them well.
Remove from the mortar.
Pour the orange blossom sugar into a dry and clean storage jar or container.
Use as needed.

title: How to Make Chocolate Orange Cookies with Cream Cheese Filling
steps: Preheat the oven to 350℉ (175℃).
Mix the dry ingredients.
Cream the butter and sugar.
Add the vanilla, egg, and orange zest to the creamed mixture.
Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients.
Bake the cookies.
Top the cookies with chocolate.
Make the cream cheese filling.
Add the filling to the cookies.
Serve and enjoy!.

title: How to Steam Potatoes
steps: Clean the potatoes with water and a scrub brush.
Put the potatoes in a microwave-safe bowl with water.
Cover the bowl completely with plastic wrap.
Cook the potatoes for 5 minutes.

title: How to Eat More Pulses
method: Buying and Storing Dry and Canned Pulses
steps: Buy dry pulses.
Store dry pulses in a glass container.
Stock up on pre-cooked canned pulses.
Keep canned pulses in the pantry.

title: How to Clean and Disinfect Wooden Cooking Utensils
steps: Inspect your spoon periodically for signs of wear, stains, or grease.
Use steel wool or sandpaper to smooth surfaces.
Oil wooden spoons periodically to renew and retain vibrancy.

title: How to Make Ginger Orange Tea
steps: Peel and slice the ginger root into small pieces.
Fish the ginger pieces out of the water or leave them in.
Add orange juice.
Add lemon juice.
Add honey, bit by bit.
Serve!.

title: How to Freeze Baked Cookies or Biscuits
steps: Place the biscuits or cookies into a rigid, airtight container.
Separate the biscuits and cookies using freezer paper, baking paper, or foil.
Place biscuits in freezer.
Thaw.

title: How to Cook Bitter Melon
method: Whipping Up Bitter Melon with Onion and Spices
steps: Heat the oil in a wok.
Add the fennel seeds and cook for 30 seconds.
Mix in the turmeric powder.
Stir in the onions and salt and cook the mixture for 10 to 12 minutes.
Add the bitter melon.
Cover the mixture and cook for at least 10 minutes.
Mix in the fennel seed powder, lime juice, and sugar.
Allow the mixture to cook for another 5 minutes.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve.

title: How to Cut a Mango
steps: Wash the mango.
Peel the mango with a Y-shaped vegetable peeler.
Slice the top end and bottom off of the mango.
Insert a corn-on-the-cob holder in either end of the mango.
Use a knife to cut the mango into three pieces.
Trim the flesh off the pit.

title: How to Make Bhindi (Okra) Sambhar
steps: In a pan heat some oil and sauté the bhindi for 5-10 mins with some curd.
Meanwhile Boil 1 cup of Toor dal with little turmeric and asefotida.
Then, In a heavy bottomed pan heat oil.
The add the Onion, Tomato, and sprinkle some salt.
Once the raw smell of Onion goes, add Chili powder,  Zeera Methi powder (See Tips) and a little Turmeric powder.
Then add the fried Okra.
Now, Put in a glass of water.
Simmer it for 5-10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves & Serve!.

title: How to Decorate a Rustic Wedding Cake
steps: Decide your budget.
Choose between a single-layer cake or a tiered cake.
Consider the weather.

title: How to Make a Beet Salad
steps: Clean 4 bunches of small, fresh beets or 2 very large fresh beets.
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees Fahrenheit (232 degrees Celsius).
Brush the beets with olive oil and sprinkle them lightly with sea salt.
Place the beets in a baking dish and place them in the oven.
Remove the beets from the oven and place them in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
Peel the beets using gentle pressure with your fingers, once they have cooled.
Dice the beets and place them in a large bowl.
Mix the dressing in a blender or food processor.
Place 1 lb.
Toss the lettuce with the dressing.
Divide the salad amongst 4 serving plates.
Cover the lettuce with the beets and sprinkle with 1 ounce (28.3 g) of feta cheese on each plate.
Serve immediately.

title: How to Make Mashed Potatoes
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (177°C).
Boil the potatoes until they are tender, then drain them.
Mash the potatoes.
Add the sour cream, milk, butter, and 1 cup (100 grams) of shredded cheese.
Add the onion, bacon, salt, and pepper, and stir again.
Scoop the potatoes into a greased, 2-quart (2 liters) casserole dish and cover them with the remaining shredded cheese.
Bake the potatoes for 30 to 35 minutes.
Serve the potatoes.

title: How to Dehydrate Oranges
steps: Select an orange with a thin peel.
Wash and dry the oranges.
Make incisions in the peel with a sharp knife.
Carefully remove the skin.
Place the peels on an elevated drying rack.
Put a sheet of aluminum foil or tin under the rack.
Leave the peels in the sun for at least three days.
Protect your peels with cheesecloth while they dry.
Store your orange peels in an airtight container.

title: How to Make Sour Cream Cornbread
method: Making Sweet and Moist Sour Cream Cornbread
steps: Heat the oven and the skillet.
Whisk the dry ingredients.
Whisk the wet ingredients.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients.
Spread the batter in the hot skillet.
Bake the sweet and moist sour cream cornbread.

title: How to Make Pumpkin Pie Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 350° Fahrenheit (176° Celsius).
Cover a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, combine the egg, melted butter, and sugar with an electric mixer.
Pour in the pumpkin pie filling, molasses, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and allspice.
Fold in the dry ingredients.
Using a mini ice cream scoop or tablespoon, drop the cookie dough onto the baking sheet.
Bake the cookies in the oven for about 10 minutes, until they are golden brown and have fully baked.
Remove the baking sheet from the oven and allow the cookies to cool for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
Finished.

title: How to Store Pizza Dough
steps: Coat the dough balls with olive oil or baking spray.
Wrap each ball with parchment paper if you plan on keeping them together.
Place the dough in a freezer-safe plastic bag.
Store the dough in the freezer for up to 3 months.
Thaw the dough in the fridge 12 hours before you want to use it.
Let the dough warm up for 30 minutes before stretching it.

title: How to Make a Bacon Flavored Dip Mix
steps: Measure the ingredients and add them to a small bowl.
Blend everything thoroughly with a spoon.
Add the mixture to an airtight container.
Store the mixture until ready to use.
Create the bacon dip.
Chill in the refrigerator for about an hour before using.

title: How to Make a Kani Salad
steps: Wash, peel, and cut the cucumber and carrots into matchstick pieces.
Shred the lettuce into bite sized pieces.
Shred the crab sticks into strips.
Toss the cucumber, carrots, and lettuce in a bowl with the mayonnaise.
Layer the crab sticks on the top.
Chill the mixture until ready to serve.
Finished.

title: How to Cook Fish Fillets
method: Baking Fillets with Lemon Cream Sauce
steps: Preheat the oven to 390 °F (199 °C) and season the fish.
Arrange the fillets in a baking dish.
Put the butter, cream, garlic, mustard, and lemon juice in a bowl.
Microwave the sauce ingredients for 1 minute.
Mince the shallots and scatter them over the fish.
Pour the sauce over the fillets and bake them for 10 to 12 minutes.
Serve the baked fish with fresh parsley and lemon slices.

title: How to Cook a Potato in the Microwave
steps: Scrub, wash and dry a large potato.
Cover and cook.
Peel the potato.
Mash the potato.
Finished.

title: How to Bake Tsoureki (Greek Sweet Bread)
steps: Place finished (and cooled) Vaselopita onto large plate.
Have the primary caregiver in the house place money (around $20-40 dollars) onto center of table near Vaselopita.
Carve a cross shape into the top (the ritual begins with a remembrance of Christ).
Spin Vaselopita three times (also a religious reference, this time to the Trinity).
Cut Vaselopita into equal sections, in this order:.
Search pieces for the coin.
Spend the prize money on something frivolous that makes you happy!.
The only situation in which the money is used seriously is if the Church wins.
Keep the coin in a safe place for the next year and do not spend it!.

title: How to Make Thai Iced Coffee
steps: Mix the water, instant coffee, condensed milk, and cardamom.
Add ice to four glasses.
Pour the coffee mixture over the ice and add half and half.

title: How to Quench Thirst Fast
steps: Eat fruits like watermelon and strawberries.
Choose vegetables like cucumbers or celery.
Make a chilled soup.

title: How to Make Heavy Cream Without Butter
steps: Buy at least 2 cups of raw milk.
Pour raw milk in a 13-by-9-inch baking pan.
Refrigerate for 24 hours.
Skim away the cream on top of the milk to a separate container.
Pour cream in pint jar and refrigerate for 24-48 hours more.
Chill bowl and whisk attachment of mixer for 15 minutes.
Put 1 cup of cream in the chilled bowl.
Slowly, mix faster until it is on high speed.
Whisk 1 tablespoon of sugar and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract.

title: How to Make a Flax Egg
steps: Measure the flax seeds and water into a small saucepan.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then cook it for 20 to 25 minutes.
Strain the mixture into a bowl.
Discard the seeds and allow the gel to cool.
Use the flax gel egg.

title: How to Choose Asian Cooking Utensils
steps: Use a wok ladle for adding or removing water and stock from the wok.
Use a deep frying basket for ease of frying.
Use a wire mesh skimmer for picking pieces of food out of boiling dishes.
Use a steaming basket for steaming items.
Use a wok chan for stir-fries.
Use a wok draining rack.
Use cooking chopsticks for turning food as it cooks.

title: How to Make Savoury Floral Butter
steps: Pluck the flowers from the herbs if you haven't already done so.
Place the herb flowers and the butter into the mixing bowl.
Whisk together until combined.
Place the butter in the mould.
Serve or use in pre-made food as needed.

title: How to Make Groundhog Day Cookies
steps: Sift the following ingredients into a bowl: the flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, and three spices.
Cream the butter and sugar.
Stir the sifted mixture into the butter mixture.
Form into a dough ball.
Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.
Pull off a small piece of dough and place it on plastic food wrap.
Roll over the plastic wrap to flatten to the dough to about ⁄8 inch (0.3 cm) thickness.
Cut out the cookies.
Arrange the cookies on the cookie sheet.
Place in the oven.
Leave the cookie sheet to cool slightly before removing the cookies.
Finished.

title: How to Make a Mocha Coffee Drink
steps: Gather your ingredients.
Combine the hot water, cocoa powder, sugar, and salt right in your mug.
Brew up some espresso.
Steam 1/2 cup of milk.
Add the steamed milk to your chocolate syrup.
Add in your espresso.
Garnish with whip cream and a sprinkling of cocoa.

title: How to Make Basic Biscuits
steps: Preheat your oven to 190*c.
Mix the butter and sugar in a bowl.
Crack your egg into your mix and slowly begin to beat it in, making sure it is all mixed together.
Add in the flour using a sieve.
Mix the flour into the paste.
Dust the worktop with flour, so that when you roll the dough it doesn't stick.
Flour the rolling pin and then place the dough on the worktop.
Grease your cooking tray with butter and place the biscuits on top.
Cook the biscuits for 15min-25min.
Let the biscuits cool off before adding any kind of decoration.

title: How to Make Parsley Tea
method:
Parsley Seed Tea[4]
	X
		Research source
steps: Boil the water.
Steep the parsley seeds for 5 minutes.
Strain the seeds.
Enjoy.

title: How to Cook Deer Sausage
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).
Grease a pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Cover the pan with bell peppers and onions (optional).
Brush the sausage links with butter to taste.
Put your sausages in the pan and roast them for 15 minutes.
Flip your sausages and cook them for another 15 minutes.
Remove your sausages when they are 160 °F (71 °C) inside.
Finished.

title: How to Cook Striped Bass
method: Poaching Striped Bass in Soy Sauce
steps: Combine all ingredients but the fish in a skillet.
Bring the mixture to a boil.
Add the striped bass and reduce the heat.
Cook the bass 8-10 minutes, turning once or twice.
Serve the bass coated in the pan sauce.

title: How to Make Chocolate Milk
steps: Combine the sugar, cocoa powder, and salt in a saucepan.
Stir in the water.
Heat the syrup.
Stir in the vanilla extract.
Allow the syrup to cool before storing it in the fridge.
Use the syrup to make chocolate milk.

title: How to Use Bergamot Oranges
steps: Slice or grate a quarter ounce (7 g) of Bergamot zest.
Add oil and grind the zest with a pestle.
Cover the mortar and let it stand for two days.
Strain the oil and store in a lidded container.
Repeat the process if desired or store your oil.

title: How to Make Halloween Pumpkin Punch
steps: Hollow out your pumpkin.
Make apple balls.
Spice the apples.
Mix it all together.Combine the apple, pineapple, and lemon juice with the apple/clove balls and cinnamon stick in a saucepan over medium heat.
Serve!.

title: How to Develop Gluten in Bread
steps: Blend all the dry ingredients together well for your dough.
Add the water to the dough while mixing slowly.
Mix the dough more vigorously.
Check the dough for proper gluten development.

title: How to Bake Tomato Bread from Scratch
steps: Prepare all of the ingredients in advance.
Measure out the flour first.
Add yeast to the flour.
Add the salt and mix into the flour.
Mix in the olive oil and the tomatoes.
Keep combining the dough until you end up with no flour left at the bottom of the bowl.
Leave dough to rest in a warm place until it rises.
Put the dough in cellophane.
Cut the dough once lengthwise then 4 times crosswise.
Break apart the 8 dough slices and form balls.
Put in an oven at 40 °C (104 °F) for 20 minutes to let the dough rise.
Once the 20 minutes is up, take the dough out of the oven and turn the oven up to 140 degrees C.
Re-dust the dough and put back in the oven.
Take it out of the oven.
Finished.

title: How to Hold Chopsticks
steps: Never stick your chopsticks straight up in a bowl of rice.
Always use both chopsticks at the same time.
Avoid laying your chopsticks across your plate or bowl unless you’re done.
Try not to gesture with your chopsticks or point them at other people.
Don’t eat or take food from the serving dish with your personal chopsticks.
Move dishes with your hands, not your chopsticks.

title: How to Make Vegan Mole
steps: Place the ancho chiles, pasilla chiles and raisins in a heatproof bowl.
Heat the canola oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic to the oil, stirring to make sure that the vegetables are coated in the oil.
Pour the chile mixture and its soaking liquid into a blender or food processor.
Puree the mixture until it is smooth.
Add the cooked onions and garlic in oil to the blender or food processor.
Add the tomatoes, peanuts, tortilla chips, vinegar, cinnamon, coriander and cloves to the blender or food processor.
Puree all of the ingredients until they produce a smooth paste.
Transfer the paste to a medium saucepan, scraping the sides of the blender pitcher or food processor bowl with a flat plastic spatula.
Add the vegetable broth and the chocolate to the saucepan.
Cook the mixture, stirring it occasionally with a wooden spoon, over low heat.
Taste the sauce and add salt as needed.
Serve the sauce or store it in an airtight container.

title: How to Make Instant Mashed Potatoes
steps: Include garlic powder.
Stir a little sour cream into the instant mashed potatoes.
Replace the water with a richer dairy product.
Top the instant mashed potatoes with cheese and herbs.

title: How to Make Breakfast Salad
steps: Choose a vegetable base.
Toss in some fruit.
Add a protein.
Try a dressing.
Garnish with additional ingredients.

title: How to Make Coconut Cookies
steps: Use flaked coconut, not shredded coconut, for this recipe.
Take out a medium saucepan.
Brown the butter in the saucepan.
Pre heat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line baking sheets with parchment paper or a nonstick baking mat.
Scrape the chilled browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add 1/2 cup granulated sugar and 3/4 cup brown sugar to the butter.
Add the egg.
Take out another mixing bowl.
Pour half the flour mixture into the butter mixture.
Add 4 cups coconut flakes.
Use a 2-inch wide scoop to form the cookies.
Bake the cookies.
Cool the cookies on the baking sheet for 1-2 minutes.

title: How to Freeze Nuts
steps: Select the nuts.
Place the nuts into an airtight (tightly covered) container.
Place in the freezer.
Thaw.

title: How to Store Food
steps: Freeze food in tightly sealed plastic freezer bags.
Freeze food in appropriate portions.
Date and label everything.
Freeze raw or cooked meat for 6-12 months.
Blanch vegetables before freezing.
Put the fruit into the freezer that you want to take out.

title: How to Make Dumpling Wrappers
steps: Shape your dough into a fat circle.
Make the hole in your dough larger.
Cut your circle of dough in half to form two logs.
Use a sharp knife to slice the dough into portions for your wrappers.
Shape each piece into a small disk with your hands.
Use a rolling pin to thin out the edges of your dumpling wrapper.
Do 3-5 wrappers at a time then wrap them up tightly in plastic wrap.

title: How to Make Traditional Mint Sauce
method: Making Traditional Indian Mint Chutney Sauce
steps: Collect your ingredients.
Place all of the ingredients in a blender.
Put the mixture in a jar.

title: How to Make a Hot Chocolate Milkshake
steps: Get 2 cups of milk.
Pour the milk in the blender.
Put 2-4 TBS of hot chocolate powder in the blender and mix it well.
Get out your ice cream scoop and grab hold of your favorite ice cream flavor!.
Measure 2 scoops of ice cream and add this to the blender.
Serve as you please!.
Top with whipped cream and cinnamon if desired.
Bon appetite !.
Finished.

title: How to Make Apple Strudel
steps: Brush the dough with ¼ cup of the melted butter.
Sprinkle the buttery bread crumbs in the center of the dough, making sure to keep the sides free so they can be folded over the filling.
Place the seasoned apple slices over the crumbs, and then sprinkle the lemon peel over apples.
Spread the chopped nuts and raisins evenly across the dough.
Fold the dough on three sides so it covers the filling.
Roll the dough over filling, starting at the narrow end; the strudel should now look like a large jelly role.
Cut the Strudel in half, and gently roll both halves onto a baking sheet.
Brush the excess flour off of each roll, then pinch the ends of each strudel together, so the filling won't ooze out while it's baking.
Bake in the oven at 350° for 30-45 minutes, or until golden brown.
Place the strudel onto a cooling rack.

title: How to Select and Store Brussels Sprouts
steps: Rinse dirt and dust off of the sprouts.
Blanch the sprouts in a pot of boiling water for 3–5 minutes.
Submerge the blanched sprouts in a bowl of ice water.
Place the wet sprouts on a clean towel to dry.
Spread the sprouts on a cookie sheet and freeze them overnight.
Put the frozen sprouts in a freezer-safe container or sealable bag.

title: How to Make Violet Vinegar
steps: Place the violet flowers into the sterilised jar.
Pour the white wine vinegar over the flowers.
Put the lid on the container.
Place the container in a windowsill for several days.
Strain to remove the violet flowers.
Restore the lid to the vinegar and place in the refrigerator for storage.

title: How to Clean Le Creuset
steps: Handwash glassware.
Put stainless steel knives in the dishwasher.
Dry Le Creuset wooden items thoroughly.
Clean silicone utensils in the dishwasher.

title: How to Make Corn Meal Chips
steps: Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).
Lightly grease a baking sheet.
Bring water, butter, seasonings to a boil.
Remove pan from heat.
Add the corn meal and stir well.
Divide dough into 30 portions.
Roll out each portion about  3/4-inch diameter.
Place balls onto baking sheet.
Top with a piece of wax paper and flatten each ball with the bottom of a glass.
Remove wax paper.
Bake until light brown, about 15 minutes.
Cool on wire baking rack.
Store in airtight container.
Makes about 30 chips.

title: How to Thicken Potato Soup
steps: Puree 1–2 cups (240–470 mL) of the soup to thicken it without adding anything.
Stir in pureed nuts to add protein.
Stir in cheese and let it melt for a little extra thickness at the end.

title: How to Cook Frozen Lobster Tails
method: Boiling Lobster Tails with Pepper Butter
steps: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add salt.
Add 4 tails and boil them for 3 to 10 minutes.
Heat the butter with lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper in a separate pot.
Use tongs to remove the tails and serve them with the pepper butter.

title: How to Make Sugar Syrup
steps: Make syrup without heat.
Infuse with flavor.
Create syrup du gomme.
Caramelize the syrup.

title: How to Make White Chocolate Cranberry Cookies
steps: Preheat your oven to 375℉ (190℃).
Grease your cookie sheet(s).
Cream the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a large bowl until smooth.
Beat the egg and vanilla into the mixture.
Stir the flour and baking soda into the mix.
Add the white chocolate chips and cranberries and incorporate.
Turn out spoonfuls of the dough onto the cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes.
Allow the cookies to cool for about a minute while still on the cookie sheets.
Transfer the cookies to wire racks and allow them to cool completely.
Serve the cookies and enjoy!.

title: How to Make Authentic French Crepes
steps: In a mixing bowl blend the eggs, flour, sugar, salt, vanilla, and milk.
Melt 2 tablespoons of the butter in a small saucepan and add to the batter, whisking briefly until thin and smooth batter.
Melt the remaining butter and use to brush the crepes pan as necessary.
Using a ladle, pour 1 ounce of batter into a very hot crepe pan, rapidly dipping and moving the pan in a figure 8 motion so that the batter spreads thinly and evenly over the surface.
Brown the crepe on one side about 40 seconds, turn with a narrow spatula to brown the other side.
Finished.

title: How to Make Vegan Smashed Potatoes
steps: Put the potatoes in a saucepan and cover them with water.
Cover the pot and cook the potatoes over medium-high heat for 20 minutes, or until tender when speared with a fork.
Drain the potato water.
Transfer the potatoes to a deep bowl, or hand mash them in the same saucepan with a potato masher or large fork until they are somewhat lumpy.
Add the olive oil to the potatoes while they’re still warm and continue mashing.
Add small amounts of soy milk and/or reserved potato water until you reach the desired consistency of your dish.
Season the potatoes with salt and pepper.
Finished.

title: How to Make White Chocolate Chip Macadamia Nut Cookies
steps: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F, 180 degrees C, or turn it to gas mark 4.
Mix the dry ingredients (flour, salt, and baking soda) together in a bowl.
Mix the other ingredients in a separate bowl (butter, both sugars, eggs, and vanilla).
Pour a little of the flour mixture into the wet mixture, a little at a time.
Line your cookie sheets with wax or parchment paper.
Place the cookie sheet into the oven for 10 minutes or until they turn a golden brown color.
Finished.

title: How to Make Gnocchi Alla Puttanesca
steps: Place a stove-top wok over medium heat.
Pour in the diced tomatoes over the caramelized fish/garlic mix.
Boil 5 cups of water in a large pot over high heat on a separate burner.
Add gnocchi to the boiling water.
Remove the simmering puttanesca from heat.
Finished.

title: How to Clean Porcelain Grill Grates
steps: Get a cleaner that is safe for use on porcelain.
Apply the cleaner.
Remove excess cleaner before using the grill.

title: How to Make Flour Lefse
steps: Bring water, butter, and lard to a boil.
Add 1/2 cup of cream, salt, and sugar.
Put 7 cups of flour into a mixing bowl.
Make a well in the flour in the center of the bowl (a hole that does not go all the way to the bottom of the bowl).
Pour the hot liquid into the well.
Mix well.
Let stand until cool, or refrigerate overnight.
Make dough into ping-pong sized balls.
Roll flat and thin (to the thickness of a quarter.).
Bake on griddle until golden browned.
Flip and bake the other side.
Place lefse between tea-towels to cool, cover with plastic wrap to maintain moisture.
Do not stack lefse until it has cooled.

title: How to Season Peas
steps: Put 1 can of drained peas into a saucepan with a little water.
Simmer the peas over medium heat and add butter.
Add other seasonings to taste.
Cook the peas until they are heated through and the butter is melted.

title: How to Make Peanut Butter Star Cookies
steps: Begin mixing in medium size bowl,1 tsp.
Cream together in same bowl, 1/2 cup butter and 1/2 cup peanut butter.
Gradually Add:(to same bowl) 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 unbeaten egg, 1 tsp.
Beat while blending in dry ingredients.
Take ingredients in bowl and shape into balls.
Roll balls into sugar.
Spray the baking pan with cooking spray.
Bake at 375*F for 8 minutes.
Add chocolate stars to the top of each cookie immediately after taking them out of the oven.
Let cookies cool for 5 minutes before eating.
Finished.

title: How to Defrost Bacon Quickly
steps: Place the bacon into a watertight plastic bag if the packaging is open.
Submerge the bag of bacon in cold water.
Replace the water every 30 minutes until the bacon is thawed.
Cook the bacon in the oven, a pan, or in the microwave.
Refrigerate cooked bacon for up to 5 days.

title: How to Grate Nutmeg
steps: Purchase a nut mill, spice grinder or nutmeg grinder from a kitchen retailer.
Buy fresh whole nutmeg.
Crack the nutmeg shell off by pressing a plate or knife turned sideways on the nut while it is on the cutting board.
